item.description:
I ran this race a few years ago...with one insole in my sneaker (That's what the night before at Jimmy's will do for you).  Anyways, this is a fun event and a chance to burn some of those stuffing calories before consuming them.  Runners and Walkers welcome...see details below:

The Newport Running Club organizes the annual Pie Run, held Thanksgiving morning, in Middletown, RI.  This year's race will be on Thursday, November 22, 2012, starting promptly at 8:30 am.  The 5 mile USATF sanctioned road race and 3 mile non-competitive walk starts and ends in front of the Newport County YMCA, 792 Valley Road, and is a scenic course with panoramic views of Sachuest Beach.   Entrants are asked to bring one non-perishable food item to be contributed to a local food bank.    Long sleeve technical shirts are available for all preregistered participants whose registrations are received prior to November 8th, 2012.     Entry cost is $25, both pre and post registration.     To register:        Register online at Raceit  or        Print out and mail in application; click here for the application and mail to:      NewportFed Pie Run, 30 Orms Street, Pawtucket, RI 02861    Number Pickup and Post Registration is at the Newport County YMCA at the following dates / times:      Wednesday, November 21st, 4:00 - 7:00 pm      Thursday,    November 22nd, 7:15 - 8:15 am   5 Mile running race and 3 mile non-competitive walk start at 8:30 am
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be standing by the big Y...I'll where a bright orange shirt...because I like orange.
item.name: Newport Pie Race (Thanksgiving Morning)
